feature_list: User-friendly interface for both farm staff and farmers
Comprehensive system to manage import and export states and revenue statistics
A user-friendly registration process for farmers to create an account on the website
Comprehensive catalogue of all kinds of pigs supplied by the farm, including detailed information about each breed, age, and price

phase: Developing a user-friendly interface for both farm staff and farmers
feature_list: Ordering system that enables farmers to purchase one or many piglets needed, with real-time updates on availability and delivery status

phase: Integrating existing farm management systems and providing actionable insights to farmers
feature_list: Communication channel between farmers and the farm for ensuring proper care of purchased piglets, including regular updates on feeding and vaccination procedures
Access to an information hub where farmers can learn about feeding and vaccination procedures, as well as any other relevant information necessary for caring for their purchased piglets
Generation of monthly, quarterly, and annual reports by the farm owner
